name: vatsim-traffic
description: Performs analysis of traffic on the VATSIM network for TMU purposes.

scripts.build: copyfiles -f client/index.html public && npm run webpack
scripts.build-dev: copyfiles -f client/index.html public && npm run webpack-dev
scripts.OLDbuild: copyfiles -f client/index.html public && babel client -d public
scripts._note: If webpack-dev becomes painfully slow, using `eval-source-map` will run faster, but will also show some duplicitave 'internal' source maps which may be annoying

author: Erik Quinn
